title: We are missing the easiest and best selfie thread of them all, The Doodle Selfie Thread!!
body:
A MS Paint Selfie Thread!!


Here you can draw yourself in MS Paint Doodle!!
Where u can show your true self in a Ms Paint doodle to the rest of GD!! 

Unleash the inner doodle GD!! mehehehehehe

http://i1286.photobucket.com/albums/a610/Arduno/Arduno%20doodle_zpsavhhyqnu.jpg

And don't laugh at my doodle skills!!!
its acceptable in my eyes....
Cough cough.............


.
